      • searchSubcontractors

        public SubcontractorTableModel searchSubcontractors(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.String location)
        Returns a list of all matching records which match the search criteria.
        Parameters:
        name - - String name of subcontractor to search
        location - - String location to search
        Returns:
        suncertify.ui.SubcontractorTableModel of search results
        See Also:
        Database.find(String[])

      • bookRecord

        public SubcontractorTableModel bookRecord(java.lang.String[] record,
                                 java.lang.String customerID)
        Books the specified record and applies the provided customerID to the record. This method acquires a lock on the specified record, updates the customer field and releases the lock on the specified record, then returns a SubscriberTableModel of all records.
        Parameters:
        record - - String[] the record to book
        customerID - - the String customerID to apply to booking
        Returns:
        suncertify.ui.SubcontractorTableModel all records
